question: Who is the Fifth Indian cricket player to feature in 300 ODI?
explanation: Yuvraj Singh became the Fifth Indian cricket player to feature in 300 One Day Internationals (ODI). Yuvraj Singh started his ODI in the year 2000 scored 8500 runs and picked 100 wickets. After Mohammed Azharuddin, Sachin Tendulkar, Sourav Ganguly, and Rahul Dravid Yuvaraj obtained the pride.
